tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE logs_table (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trails_table (
  trail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  action VARCHAR,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_table (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR,
  value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE logs (timestamp TIMESTAMP, log_message TEXT, log_level VARCHAR(10))
CREATE TABLE audit_trails (event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, event_type VARCHAR(50), event_description TEXT, user_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), role VARCHAR(20))
CREATE TABLE roles (role_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(20), permissions JSON)
